reviews.review_msg: Dr. Patterson is BY FAR the worst professor I've ever had. She gives assignments with unclear expectations and gives terrible feedback. As this course was online, Dr. Patterson would be slow to answer emails and would direct you to "refer to the syllabus" instead of actually answering your question. Terrible TERRIBLE prof. Avoid at all costs.
Very tough marker. Extremely vague in what she expects. Does not answer questions or encourage discussion. Avoid this teacher!
